task.title: Bacon-wrapped sausage
task.shortdesc: Good thing you like meat! This is an awesome way to combine two favorite breakfast foods into one.

taskbody.context:
Below are the ingredients and steps that will tell you how to make delicious bacon-wrapped sausages.
Ingredients:
1 pound of bacon
2 pounds of smoked sausage
2 table spoons of chili pepper flakes
¾ teaspoon of brown sugar (per sausage)
Steps:

step.cmd: Cut bacon strips in half length-wise.
Cut sausage into pieces that are about the same width of the bacon strips.
Wrap the ½ strips of bacon around the sausages and hold it in place with a toothpick or fork.
Place them on top of a cookie sheet and sprinkle the pepper flakes on top of each sausage.
Top each sausage with a loose ½-3/4 tablespoon scoop of brown sugar.
Put the oven on 300 degrees fahrenheit and place the cookie sheet in there for 45-60 minutes.
Once the brown sugar is melted down, they are ready to take out, let cool, and enjoy!
